```{r Functions}

# tau(t) = min(Tt/100, T)
# K(t) = exp(−beta*tau(t)^2)
# C(t) = K(t)exp(gt)
# U(C) = (C1−eta)/(1 − eta)

# Discount rate - Ramsey rule
discount_rate = function(delta, eta, g){
  r = delta + eta*g
  return(r)
  }
```

```{r Parameters}

# Use the following base case parameters for this model: delta = .005, eta = .5, g = .01, beta = .05.

```
